lead_paragraph: New York has been running at half-speed this week. But there are some eternals, like the parade of defendants through the court system.
snippet: New York has been running at half-speed this week. But there are some eternals, like the parade of defendants through the court system.

headline.main: Justice Takes No Holiday in Room 129 at a Manhattan Court
headline.seo: Justice Takes No Holiday in Manhattan Criminal Court
headline.print_headline: Justice Takes No Holiday in Room 129 at a Manhattan Court
